title: löschen von Ordnern im E-Mail-Programm am tablet oder Handy
creator: brigittezeuner
content: Wie kann ich am Tablet/Handy Ordner aus dem E-Mail-Programm löschen?

title: Thunderbird mobile app on Android: "Authentication failed" error
creator: sjreiling
content:
I just installed the Thunderbird mobile app on my Google PIxel 6a, and I get the following error when I try to access both Gmail and Yahoo Mail: "Authentication failed. Update your server settings."

I imported my server settings from my desktop version of Thunderbird during the standard setup of the mobile app.

Is there a solution to this problem?
